page.title: 15Torridon medical services
page.content: There is only one doctor for the whole area.The doctor's surgery is part of his house,which belongs to{Highland {Health Board},so when he retires he will have to get another house and the new doctor will get that one.At the moment there is only a relief nurse because the full time nurse retired; she got the MBE for exceptional work. We hope to get a new nurse.The nearest big hospital is 80 miles away.Surgery hours are Mond.Wed.Frid.10am:Tues.6pm in Torridon;Tues10am in Kinlochewe in the Nurse's house there.The doctors & nurses have to cover the villages of Shieldaig,Kinlochewe,Torridon,Alligin, Diabaig & Achnasheen;making house calls to all those places.As there is no chemist,doctor prescribes and sells medicines.On Thurs.doctor's day off, a Lochcarron doctor is on call.Doctor attends mountain rescue&road accidents
